info.name: Chrome Cleartype Enabler (Medium.com, Docs, more)
info.description:
Re-enables ClearType on Chrome, when disabled by websites. Supported sites:
- Medium.com
- Google Docs
- And more...

Some websites only break when HiDPI is enabled...
info.additionalInfo:
2017-02-26 release.
2017-09-06 update: Added Google Docs support.
2017-10-06 update: Added joelonsoftware.com support.
